thread.title: Rand Commercial Services Adds Maria Justo to its Growing Team of Hybrid Agents in Westchester County, NY
thread.title_full: Rand Commercial Services Adds Maria Justo to its Growing Team of Hybrid Agents in Westchester County, NY - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Rand Commercial Services Adds Maria Justo to its Growing Team of Hybrid Agents in Westchester County, NY
text:
Maria Justo Joins Rand Commercial Services in Westchester County, NY
NEW CITY, NY (PRWEB) October 19, 2015
Rand Commercial Services is expanding its team with the addition of Maria Justo. Maria has been added to a unique team of hybrid agents that will serve both the commercial real estate industry through Rand Commercial Services and the residential markets through Better Homes and Gardens Rand Realty.
“Maria is an experienced commercial real estate professional, and RCS is proud to have her serving the needs of our clients in Westchester County,” said RCS Regional Manager, Paul Adler, Esq. “Maria will provide innovative, dedicated, and professional service in the commercial real estate brokerage sector, which is helping to improve and grow the economy of Westchester and the surrounding region.”
As a resident of Westchester County for more than 30 years, Maria’s knowledge of the area will offer significant help to her clients who are either buying or selling. Other than Westchester, Maria also serves clients in Putnam and Dutchess Counties, as well as the Bronx.
“I am extremely excited to be joining Rand Commercial Services and this unique team of hybrid agents,” said Maria. “RCS has a great reputation for providing excellent client service and is a leader in Hudson Valley commercial real estate. The tools offered by Rand Commercial Services to help its agents best serve their local communities are outstanding, and I look forward to working with such an impressive team.”
About Rand Commercial Services
Rand Commercial Services (RCS) is an independent, full-service commercial real estate brokerage that serves the Greater New York area. The firm specializes in repositioning and redeveloping properties to improve their returns, in addition to assisting clients with more conventional sales and leasing. RCS has nearly 35 agents in Orange, Rockland, and Westchester Counties, and also serves New York City, Northern New Jersey, and Connecticut. To learn more about Rand Commercial Services, visit RandCommercial.com .
